attributes.action: create a roundabout in Gorseinon, instead of the traffic lights by the bug
attributes.additional_details: A few years ago, a temporary roundabout was put in place instead of traffic lights, and the traffic congestion was eased a great deal. Now the traffic lights are back, the traffic leads all the way through Gorseinon, which is already a congested town due to traffic lights further up the road. A simple permanent roundabout instead of the traffic lights would ease this.
